app.title: ProDocuX - AI Document Intelligence Platform RC1

upload.title: Drag files here
upload.subtitle: Supports PDF, DOCX, DOC formats, max 50MB

workflow.title: Workflow Management
workflow.step1: Create workflow with dedicated configuration, templates and prompts
workflow.step2: Select workflow, system automatically loads default settings
workflow.step3: Upload files and start processing, with temporary setting adjustments

messages.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete?
messages.confirmReset: Are you sure you want to reset?

setup.title: ProDocuX Initial Setup
setup.subtitle: Let's guide you through the setup step by step

step1.title: üìÅ Step 1/4: Workspace Setup
step1.description: ProDocuX needs a workspace directory to store your files and settings
step1.suggestionText: We recommend using your Documents folder for easy access and management

step2.title: ü§ñ Step 2/4: AI Provider Selection
step2.description: Please select the AI provider you have API keys for
step2.openaiDesc: Most popular AI service, powerful and supports multiple tasks
step2.claudeDesc: Excellent at document analysis and understanding, good Chinese support
step2.geminiDesc: Google's AI service with generous free quota
step2.grokDesc: Emerging AI service with relatively affordable pricing
step2.microsoftDesc: Microsoft's AI service with good Office integration

step4.title: üñ•Ô∏è Step 4/4: Desktop Shortcuts
step4.description: Choose shortcuts to create on desktop

settings.profileHelp: Current work's dedicated configuration, click 'Edit Work' to adjust
settings.templateHelp: Current work's dedicated template, click 'Edit Work' to adjust
settings.promptHelp: Current work's dedicated prompt, click 'Edit Work' to adjust
settings.aiModelHelp: Select default AI model (system will prioritize this model)
settings.aiProviderHelp: Select default AI provider (system will prioritize this provider)
settings.profileStrategyHelp: Control whether to attach Profile configuration in prompts
settings.outputFolderHelp: Default output folder for the workspace
settings.title: ProDocuX - Settings
settings.subtitle: Customize file processing settings
settings.inputDirectoryHelp: For storing files to be processed
settings.openaiAPIKeyHelp: OpenAI API key for ChatGPT models
settings.maxFileSizeHelp: Maximum size limit for individual files
settings.enableAutoCleanup: Enable automatic cleanup of old files
settings.autoCleanupHelp: Automatically delete files older than specified days
settings.batchModeHelp: Automatically process all files from input directory

placeholders.selectOrCreateWork: Please select or create a new work...
placeholders.generateProfilePrompt: Please upload template file first, then click the button above to generate Profile prompt...
placeholders.generatePromptTemplate: Please upload template file and validate Profile first, then click the button above to generate prompt template...

createWork.workNameHelp: Suggested to use descriptive names, such as: Brand + Document Type
createWork.workDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe the document types and requirements you wish to process...
createWork.workDescriptionHelp: Detailed description helps AI generate more accurate profiles
createWork.brandHelp: Brand information for identification and categorization
createWork.templateHelp: Supported formats: Word (.docx, .doc), PDF (.pdf). Please upload template first, AI will generate more accurate Profile and prompts based on template structure.
createWork.safetyInfo: To ensure generated Profile and prompts meet safety standards, the system will use AI models for safety checks. This will consume a small amount of tokens.
createWork.selectSafetyModel: Select AI models to use for safety checks:
createWork.selectModelForPricing: Please select a model to view pricing information
createWork.safetyModelHelp: Please select at least one model for safety checks. You can freely choose any available model based on cost and requirements.
createWork.aiToolsDesc: You can use the following AI tools to generate Profile and prompts:
createWork.uploadNotice: Please upload both template file and Profile prompt to your AI tool, so AI can better understand template structure and generate accurate Profile.
createWork.optimizationNotice: System-generated Profile and prompts are auto-generated, please adjust and optimize according to your specific needs for best results.
createWork.profilePromptHelp: AI will analyze template structure and generate more accurate Profile prompts. Copy this prompt to use in AI tools.
createWork.pasteProfileJson: Please paste AI generated Profile JSON...
createWork.promptTemplateHelp: AI will generate more accurate extraction prompts based on Profile and template structure. Copy this prompt to use in AI tools.

pageSelection.title: Select Pages to Process
pageSelection.info: Please select the pages to be processed. Files with unselected pages will process all pages.
pageSelection.description: Please enter the page numbers to be processed (order within the file, not manual page numbers)
pageSelection.supportedFormats: Supported formats: single page (1,3,5), range (5-8), mixed (1,3,5-8,10)
